body: Hi I have run a VSC simulation in a courtyard creating HB zones and using the HB component and I get higher values towards the corners, which does not make sense.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/u-nuBgwJg3wZCD*0VF8wwJI*J4A5vHcFaY4G2I4WQ4Ts78VezNNdBnttQlUe07As0Z6aY03iA-fK34QAUpxrulwYIQnSQr7H/2.jpg) On the other hand if I introduce the geometry as HB objects instead of creating HB zones, the results are different (which in theory should not because its the same geometry) and more sensible (lower toward the corners). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/u-nuBgwJg3wBdPTY92BCvfrdMvO7*ICZzaCnzKW9BiQdC*1Y1C4423CnjML5bJTo98nfxa4papNeaGR3P28Nf0a9TbxvMkVD/1.jpg) Is this a bug or am I maybe overlooking something?
